```{r upload packages, results = "hide"}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r}
counties <- read.csv("datafiles/us-counties.csv")
states <- read.csv("datafiles/us-states.csv")
```

```{r}
toptencounties <- counties %>%
  filter(date == "2020-04-08") %>%
  arrange(desc(cases))
  
toptencounties <- toptencounties[1:10,]

toptenstates <- states %>%
  filter(date == "2020-04-08") %>%
  arrange(desc(cases))

toptenstates <- toptenstates[1:10,]
```

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(data = toptencounties, mapping = aes(x = county, y = cases)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip()

p2 <- ggplot(data = toptenstates, mapping = aes(x = state, y = cases)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip() 

p1 + p2
```
